projectCategory.name: Client

fields.summary: Android: on ICS 4, 'backgroundSelectedImage:image' does not disappear after clicking on a tableViewRow
fields.environment:
TiSDK tested 2.0 and 2.1
Android OS 4 with ICS

comments.body: I see this bug also with Mobile SDK 1.8.2.
This issue happens on 3.x, 4.0 and 4.1 devices.

BackgroundImage as well as backgroundColor is disappearing after click release. 
Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 3.1.0.v20130114171802
Titanium Â Studio:3.0.1.201212181159
Device: Samsung GALAXY Note (2.3.6) , Nexus 7 Android 4.1
